actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for additional sentences for commission of a felony with use of a firearm.

summary.text: Provides for a sentence of not less than five nor more than fifteen years for the commission of a felony with a firearm in addition to the sentence imposed for the commission of the felony. Provides for an additional sentence of from ten to thirty years for the commission of any subsequent felony with a firearm.

titles.title: A bill to provide for additional sentences for commission of a felony with use of a firearm.
